subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* In Chinese, the component below {{l|mul|日}} is written as <big>{{l|mul|爰}}</big> (9 strokes), which is the orthodox form found in the {{w|Kangxi dictionary}}.
* In Japanese, the component below {{l|mul|日}} is written as {{l|mul|⿳[[爫]][[土]][[夂]]}} (10 strokes) in the {{w|CJK Unified Ideographs Extension A|Unicode tables}}.

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This character is not related with {{l|mul|暖}}.
